meanings.definition: In a manner relating to photography.
meanings.sent2: The photographer worked photographically to develop the film.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to take a photographically perfect selfie.
meanings.sent4: Her memory was like a photographically detailed picture.
meanings.sent5: The colors in the photo popped photographically.

meanings.sent1: He displayed his photographically skills at the exhibition.
meanings.sent3: The photographically contest drew many participants.
meanings.sent4: Her photographically eye caught the beauty of the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The photographically studio was filled with light.

meanings.sent3: The treasure map was drawn photographically.
meanings.sent4: She explored the world photographically through her lens.
meanings.sent5: The story was told photographically in a series of images.
